name: Deep into the vibe
description:
Arrows or AWSD to jump platforms. Pickup hearts and coins until the song is over!

Some platforms are actually spawned on musical beats, but I couldn't get analyzer to work well, so It's not used in gameplay haha

This is an entry for Ludum Dare competition, what means that everyything was maddee by a single person (me) in 48 hours. You can rate the game here
